about_the_game:
The day-one special mission "Her Name is Super Fumina" is the only mission where you'll find the titular Super Fumina!
Complete it to receive a special Fumina Ticket that can be exchanged for any part you like!

*You can replay "Her Name is Super Fumina" again once a single day has passed since your last playthrough.
*"Her Name is Super Fumina" cannot be played in multiplayer.
detailed_description:
The day-one special mission "Her Name is Super Fumina" is the only mission where you'll find the titular Super Fumina!
Complete it to receive a special Fumina Ticket that can be exchanged for any part you like!

*You can replay "Her Name is Super Fumina" again once a single day has passed since your last playthrough.
*"Her Name is Super Fumina" cannot be played in multiplayer.

name: New Gundam Breaker Special Mission: Her Name is Super Fumina

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 CPU @ 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: The day-one special mission "Her Name is Super Fumina" is the only mission where you'll find the titular Super Fumina! Complete it to receive a special Fumina Ticket that can be exchanged for any part you like!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
